title: flygate
author: flygate
content: Renowned financial author Robert Kiyosaki, best known for Rich Dad Poor Dad, has declared that the catastrophic stock market crash he predicted in his 2013 book Rich Dadâ€™s Prophecy is now unfolding. In a recent post on X (formerly Twitter), Kiyosaki highlighted what he considers a fundamental flaw in modern retirement systems, warning investors of the risks associated with certain financial products.https://www.coinim.net/robert-kiyosaki-warns-of-historic-market-crash-calls-etfs-a-deception/

comments.author: Ambatman
comments.body: Posting news and adding a link was posted about on meta. And again, not active since 2018And now started posting news link Account likely changed hands either been sold or hacked.

comments.author: flygate
comments.body: Quote from: Ambatman on March 09, 2025, 09:11:21 PMPosting news and adding a link was posted about on meta. And again, not active since 2018And now started posting news link Account likely changed hands either been sold or hacked. What bothers you is that I'm trying to do something. We're trying to do something as best we can. We're not getting anything out of it. What bothers you?

comments.author: flygate
comments.body: Quote from: Ambatman on March 09, 2025, 09:11:21 PMPosting news and adding a link was posted about on meta. And again, not active since 2018And now started posting news link Account likely changed hands either been sold or hacked. Does being a hero member give you the right to block people's efforts?

comments.author: Ambatman
comments.body: Quote from: flygate on March 09, 2025, 09:18:54 PMQuote from: Ambatman on March 09, 2025, 09:11:21 PMPosting news and adding a link was posted about on meta. And again, not active since 2018And now started posting news link Account likely changed hands either been sold or hacked. What bothers you is that I'm trying to do something. We're trying to do something as best we can. We're not getting anything out of it. What bothers you? Nothing. It cost me nothing Just stating my view. I said likely, I never said you were and sold account is frowned upon here. Quote from: flygate on March 09, 2025, 09:19:55 PMDoes being a hero member give you the right to block people's efforts? Lol if only I had such power Did I block your effort? What I'm stating is you could have atleast added your view or something so it won't seem like a copy paste. You do you.

You do you. the website belongs to me. and this account was an account I used before I graduated from school. i opened it for bounthive.io. now i share the same things here that i share on my own website. my reddit account is from the same time. we used to use it to do tasks.
